FuncDef: This command clears various internal IKE statistics for the specified scope:

ParaDef.Info: Clears information about the name of the IPsec GW up to 32 characters.
Clears information about the IP address and port of the peer for dynamic tunneling.
Clears information about the specified ISA. Values-slot/mda.
Clears the name of the static LAN-to-LAN tunnel up to 32 characters.
